recommendInteractions(Context) - Method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner
Calls the SocialGraphMiner.predictNewInteraction(Context, Node) to score the likelihood of interacting with all nodes of the given context.

RepeatMiner - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.heuristics
This class provides a SocialGraphMiner that re-recommends previous interactions with alters based on their chronological order.

RepeatMiner.SendOrderTimestamp - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.module.socialgraphmining.heuristics
This class is used to hold information about the order alters have been interacted with.
